title: City of Wind
description: Dangerous intrigues and mysterious powers ensnare Dara and Siv in the brutal canal city Pendark. A magical shackle binds Dara to her agreement to help a cunning Waterworker study the link between Fire and Watermight. Dara will learn more than she bargained for from Wyla, if the lessons don’t kill her first.Siv gathers allies and gold to rescue his sister and retake his kingdom. But he can’t do it without Dara. When Wyla refuses to release her, Siv must take drastic measures to free her. He won’t let a little thing like a powerful magic wielder stop him from saving the woman he loves.As the armies of Soole ravage her grandfather’s kingdom, Princess Selivia flees to the distant City of Wind. She discovers unexpected trouble there—and a secret that will change the world forever.Read the exciting fourth novel in this epic fantasy series full of vivid magic, mysterious enemies, romance, and adventure!Check out all eight books set in this immersive fantasy Steel and Fire1 - Duel of Fire2 - King of Mist3 - Dance of Steel4 - City of Wind5 - Night of FlameThe Fire Queen's Apprentice1 - The Watermight Thief2 - The Thunderbird Queen3 - The Dragonfly Oath
